name: Bloody Realm
description:
Only playable with motion leap. support for keyboard will come soon.

Use your hands to swing your arms in rhythm against valorous knights and ressurect your undead army of skeletons !

Done for the Orbital Game Jam round 2 with the following assets :

https://opengameart.org/content/blood-splat-animations

https://edermunizz.itch.io/

https://jesse-m.itch.io/

https://lionheart963.itch.io/

https://magodev.itch.io
